argo.system_config_generation.system_config_generation.create_new_configs module¶

Class for creating new system-ready rule configs from a set of conditions

class argo.system_config_generation.system_config_generation.create_new_configs.CreateNewConfigs(conditions: dict, scores: dict, app_prefix: str, entity: str, make_active=True, created_by='argo@simility.com')[source]¶

Bases: object

Creates system-ready rule configurations for new rules. These can be used to create the rules in the system using the create_rules_in_simility module.

rule_configs¶

Dictionary of system-ready rule JSON configurations (values) and the rule name (keys).

Type

dict

generate() → dict[source]¶

Creates system-ready rule configurations for new rules. These can be used to create the rules in the system using the create_rules_in_simility module.

Returns

Dictionary of system-ready rule JSON configurations

(in Python dictionary format).

Return type

dict
